contest-event.event-date: March 9, 2008 D Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Second Three Part Invention Bedworth Civic Hall, Bedworth, Warwickshire, England, UK May 8, 2009, 4:20 p.m. March 7, 2015, 11:27 a.m. 1 City of Coventry Brass Band Stephen Cooper 2 Harborough Band Chris Groom 3 Leicestershire Co-op Snibston Band Graham Jacklin 4 Oddfellows Brass Robert Boulter 5 Bilton Silver (Rugby) Band Brian Clarke 6 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band Colin Farlow 7 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Sharon Stansfield 8 Arrow Valley Brass Andrew Culshaw 9 Daventry Brass Nigel Howard 10 Porthywaen Band Steve Gittins 11 West Mercia Police Band David Bishop-Rowe
